Articles.Content:
Everything is simple. It's just a machine gun. It's automatic and it can shoot.

I don't know what else I can say. Just watch the video.

**There are subtitles.**

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-FUWDQBFejU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Semi automatic carbine - [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92578-Semi-automatic-carbine](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92578-Semi-automatic-carbine)

Needs more Dakka.

jk, nice job! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

TL;DW

Don't forget to put boosters on the bullets! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

WOW rep for you ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

The most amazing part is it works and dosnt explode.... never seen anything like it in KSP before. Great work KHTRE
